duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure all companion animals and aquatic life in the Pet Care Center are receiving appropriate care and maintenance.
Handle register transactions and support guest interactions to create a great experience.
Stock, price, and display merchandise to create a great presentation for our guests.
Promote a positive culture of teamwork, inclusion, and collaboration within the Pet Care Center.
Evaluate guest inquiries and act as a primary resource for guests and other PCC partners regarding animal education and care.
Efficiently order companion animals, aquatic life, supplies, and merchandise to maximize sales and inventory.
Perform routine housekeeping tasks to maintain the professional image and appearance of the companion animal habitat and aquatic areas.
Ensure proper handling and documentation for all relinquished and adoption animals.
Participate in the completion of all animal and aquatic life related physical inventory counts.
Adhere to and promote established safety and loss prevention procedures.
Utilize selling behaviors and contribute to a safe working environment.
Be a part of a collaborative culture and engage in career development programs.
Ensure quick and courteous service to all guests, maintain high merchandising standards, and adhere to safety procedures for partners, guests, and pets.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent (GED) with proficiency in mathematics, basic accounting relationships, and exceptional communication skills.
Completion and maintenance of the Petco Animal Care Certification program.
